alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 8:51AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Dodge, southwestern Telfair, southern Wilcox and southeastern Crisp Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 851 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Abbeville to near Rochelle to near Hatley, and moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Rochelle, Rhine, Jacksonville, Temperance, Browning, China Hill, Double Run, Antioch Church and Owensboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
